data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Saint John.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint John, Jersey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 3,000 citizens of the the state of Saint John.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, move the 180 believers in the state of Saint John to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Saint John.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Saint John, Jersey into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 180 believers in Saint John and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Saint John who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
